Name: Weedle Bow
LongDescription: Any Berry or Apple eaten will recover HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Weedle, Kakuna, and Beedrill.  Finding a Weedle Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
